Outcome 1: A higher percentage of workers are covered by social security schemes; Outcome 2: Increased inclusion and coverage of the poor and vulnerable population in social assistance and complementary programmes promoting improved livelihoods and well-being; Outcome 3: Social security organisations are modernised.
